response.overview: Dimag Ghochne Manche is a powerful documentary chronicling the life and legacy of Ujwal Thapa — a visionary entrepreneur, activist, and political reformer who sparked a civic awakening in Nepal. Through intimate stories and rare archival footage, the film captures how one man’s restless mind challenged conventions, inspired a generation, and redefined what it means to create change from within.
response.tagline: Powerful documentary chronicling the life and legacy of Ujwal Thapa
response.title: Dimag Ghochne Manche
